data.prayer: Please, convict the 261 believers in Darnah, Libya to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Darnah, Libya
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the state of Darnah to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Darnah, Libya to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.
Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Darnah.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Bedouin, Sanusi  people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Bedouin, Sanusi  people.
Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Darnah, Libya a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 164,239 lost in Darnah that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Darnah, Libya to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

location.name: Darnah
location.people_groups_list: Romani, Domari, Arab, Sudanese, Bedouin, Riyah , Punjabi, Western, Deaf
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Romani, Domari (36,000), Arab, Sudanese (301,000), Bedouin, Riyah  (36,000), Punjabi, Western (68,000), Deaf (34,000)
